00014 /* baud rate register value calculation */
00015 #ifndef F_CPU
00016 #define F_CPU    8000000
00017 #endif
00018 #define BAUD_RATE   19200
00019 
00020 // FLASH Pagesize in words
00021 #define FPAGESIZE   32
00022 // EEPROM Pagesize in words
00023 #define EPAGESIZE   4
00024 
00025 /* define pin for entering self programming mode */
00026 #define SCK         PB7         // SCK   pin of the target (output)
00027 #define MISO        PB6         // MISO  pin of the target (input)
00028 #define MOSI        PB5         // MOSI  pin of the target (output)
00029 #define RESET       PB4         // RESET pin of the target (output)
00030 #define PASSTHROUGH PB3     // Pull low to allow serial port passthrough to target
00031 #define LEDPROG     PB1         // dual color LED output, anode green  (output)
00032 #define LED         PB0         // LED output, active low, dual color LED cathode green (output)
00033 
00034 unsigned char BlockLoad(const unsigned int size,
00035                         const unsigned char mem,
00036                         uint16_t *address);
00037 void BlockRead(const unsigned int size,
00038                         const unsigned char mem,
00039                         uint16_t *address);
00040 uint8_t writeByte(const uint8_t datum);
00041 void writeCommand(uint8_t, uint8_t, uint8_t, uint8_t);
00042 void pollDelay(const uint8_t shortDelay);
